revised_title: Flow Analysis in Pipes of Rectangular Cross-Section
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to investigate the flow of water in a pipe of rectangular cross-section. They found that the critical value for laminar flow in rectangular pipes is in the same region as that for circular pipes. The study also showed that the square cross-section provides the maximum flow for a given pressure difference among rectangular sections.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Fluid Mechanics
